message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm asking for $13,500. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your work.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value, but I'm open to negotiating further.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $11,000 is significantly lower than I'm comfortable with.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,250? This product really is worth the investment.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise, considering the value it will bring to my work.
Bob, I'm sensing we're getting closer to a deal. I'm willing to come down slightly to $11,900. This reflects the product's true worth and is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,200 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my work.
